post:
SPECIAL OFFER FROM NLDEDICATED.COM


Join this deal and take all the benefits of our **high performance dedicated servers** starting at only €22,75 ($25.36)/month


Premium network and hardware, lifetime pricing, no setup fees, no contract!


[More information about our Bare Metal Dedicated Servers](https://nldedicated.com)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Servers are delivered almost always same day
*Heavily peered network
*Best transit connections
*Month to month contracts
*Secure Environment
*Fully Managed Available
*24/7 Support

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Bare Metal Dedicated Servers**

All our servers can be upgraded with more RAM, HARDDISKS (also SSD), traffic.
100 Mbps unmetered and 1 Gbps unmetered are available.

**HP DL120**
Processor: Intel Xeon X3430
RAM: 1GB (upgrade up to 16GB)
Storage: 160GB SATA (upgrade up to 4TB per HDD)
Bandwidth: 25TB
Speed: 1 Gbps
€22,75 Monthly ($25,36 USD exchange rate 07-09-2015)

**Locations**

All servers are located in The Netherlands and are connected to a Heavily peered network.
